data.event: In January 2014, permission was granted for a wind turbine in Silian, in the face of strong local opposition.
Bethel Chapel was built in Silian in 1654, and renovated in 1952.
Bethel Chapel was built in Silian in 1654, and renovated in 1952.
Julian Cayo-Evans, the Welsh nationalist and leader of the Free Wales Army, was born in Silian in 1937.
